DOC.brief_summary: BlueWind system safety performance treatment patient diagnose overactive bladder ( OAB )
DOC.brief_title: BlueWind Medical System Treatment Patients With OAB
DOC.detailed_description: BlueWind Medical system safety performance treatment patient diagnose overactive bladder ( OAB )
DOC.criteria: Signed write informed consent . Male female age 18 80 . Patient agree attend followup evaluation willing completely accurately fill void diary questionnaire , willing complete require exams test . Patients overactive bladder symptom : Urinary frequency great 8 times/24 hour AND/OR Urinary urgency leak least 2 leak 3 day void diary Patient fail conservative treatment least 6 month treatment Patients normally function upper urinary tract . Patients clinical evidence neurological S2S4 motor sensory deficit . Prior PTNS Group : Patients successful PTNS treatment ( successful treatment define ≥50 % reduction urinary frequency , and/or ≥50 % few incontinence episode , return normal voiding frequency [ < 8 voids/day ] , base retrospective diary review ) . De novo Patient Group : Patient pass BlueWind compatibility test . Any metal implant area BlueWind Medical implantation site . Patients stable OAB medication least 30 day . Patients receive botulinum toxin injection within past 6 month . Previous urinary incontinence surgery implantation artificial graft material within last 6 month . Any spinal genitourinary surgery within last 6 month . Pelvic pain disorder Obvious clinically demonstrate genuine stress incontinence . Any neurological disease disorder include neuropathy injury result neuropathy . Current urinary tract infection , presence urinary stone and/or urinary tract malignancy ( i.e . tumor , vesicourethral reflux , etc . ) Pelvic radiotherapy chemotherapy . Severe uncontrolled diabetes . Patients anticipate magnetic resonance imaging ( MRI ) exam . Presence cystocele , enterocele rectocele grade 3 4 . Prior PTNS Group : Patients receive concomitant nerve stimulation therapy OAB treatment , except PTNS maintenance therapy . De novo Patient Group : Patients receive receive nerve stimulation therapy OAB treatment , include PTNS .
